headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Get Valentine's Day Themed Clothing and More
content:
There’s a waft of romance mingling with gun-smoke and pollution in the air around Los Santos.

Celebrate Valentine's Day by logging in to GTA Online this week and receive the Valentines Blazer and Heartbreak Pendant — the building blocks of any suitable date-night outfit.

Acquire the new Classique Broadway by February 15 to also receive the Los Santos Lovers livery before February 24.
